about_the_game:
A zombie outbreak has taken out the artificial settlement Ziltron. Their origin is unknown, all communication seems to be lost, so now Earth sends its greatest hope, the Space Marines. Their goal, rescue any survivors, and discover the source behind this sudden outbreak. There are multiple paths to take through Ziltron, what will you discover, who will you rescue? Are you ready to finally play the hard as nails platform shooter from 2008? You better be because their fate, their lives, are all in your hands... get ready for Soulless, a pre-rendered run 'n' gun platformer from the past fully restored using Stencyl!

Features
•9 Playable characters
•10 Missions
•21 Stages
•Boss Battles
•Player performance rankings
•Individual Survivor endings

Their mission objectives:
  • Discover the source of the outbreak
  • Rescue any survivors
  • Eliminate all hostile presence


    Features
    • 6 Playable characters to rescue
    • 10 Missions
    • 21 Levels in total
    • Final boss battle on the 10th mission
    • Player performance rankings
    • Individual Survivor endings
    • Gallery
    • Music selection from the original and all new music

content_descriptors.notes: Shooting zombies that explode into a bloody mess

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.9
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Soulless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1500MHz or AMD A10 PRO-7800B APU
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6100 or AMD RADEON A9800XT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: The run 'n' gun platformer Soulless is back with this deluxe revival #MadeInStencyl
